content.text:
# 2005 Origins Award winners

The following are the winners of the 32nd annual Origins Award, held in 2006:
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Category
! Winner
! Company
! Designer(s)
|-
|Game of the Year
|WARMACHINE: Apotheosis
|Privateer Press, Inc.
|Matt Wilson, Jason Soles, and Rob Stoddard
|-

|Andrew Parks and Jason Hawkins
|-
|Collectible Card Game or Expansion of the Year

|Wizards of the Coast
|Mark Rosewater, Aaron Forsythe, Tyler Bielman, Richard Garfield, and Mike Elliott
|-

|Atlas Games
|Keith Baker
|-

|Archaia Studios Press

|-

|Steve Jackson Games
|Kenneth Hite, Steve Jackson, and John M. Ford
|-
